Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
CHILI
D.L. Abt. Language for systems programming, based on ALGOL 60 with extensions for structure and type declarations. "CHILI, An Algorithmic Language for Systems Programming", CHI-1014, Chi Corp (Sep 1975).
Chili, IN Zip code(s): 46926 Chili, WI Zip code(s): 54420

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Chili \Chil"i\, n. [Sp. chili, chile.] A kind of red pepper. See {Capsicum} [Written also {chilli} and {chile}.] [1913 Webster]

chili n 1: ground beef and chili peppers or chili powder often with tomatoes and kidney beans [syn: {chili con carne}] 2: very hot and finely tapering pepper of special pungency [syn: {chili pepper}, {chilli}, {chilly}, {chile}]
